details.description: Resurgence uses the power of open data, digital technology, media and community involvement to protect our cities from future stresses and shocks. It has particular emphasis on climate related impacts such as water-stress and flooding. Resurgence is working to accelerate the adoption of new models and technologies for the inclusive use of data for urban risk assessment, resilience building and ecosystems protection. Resurgence provides strategic research and consulting services, and has a product partnership on an open data based smart water sensor, Open Droplet.
